name: Boat Racing Challenge ( 3D Racing Games )
description:
Jump In your supercharged Boat and take a wild ride through twisting canals and rivers, futuristic cityscapes, and mysterious research facilities. Skill, stunts, and speed will be your best allies as you grab massive air off huge waves, kick out death-defying tricks, and boost your jet ski to victory across a dynamic, ever-changing torrent of foam and spray.
Try 'Boat Racing Challenge' which give you amazing driving experience on your iPhone or iPad or iPod Touch.
Features: -

***10 visually amazing and challenging Tracks 
***Simple,Smooth and effective Controls 
***Astonishing physics brings chaos to another level
***Intelligent enemies driving racing Jet Boats
***Highly detailed 3D Graphics
***Two Controls Types: Touch Controls and Tilt Controls
***Optimized For iPhone 5
